sqlQuery.name: Attrs
sqlQuery.sql: select project_id, source_id, 'CATG' || sequence as tag_sequence, sequence_source_id as sequence_id, start_min, end_max, case when is_reversed = 1 then '-' when is_reversed = 0 then '+' else '.' end as strand start_min - 5000 as context_start, end_max + 5000 as context_end, organism, case when rad_source_id is null then 'N/A' else rad_source_id end as rad_source_id from apidb.SageTagAttributes where source_id = $$primaryKey$$

sqlQuery.name: Gene
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct gene_source_id from apidb.SAGETAGGENE sg, apidb.SAGETAGATTRIBUTES a where sg.distance = 0 a.na_feature_id = sg.tag_feature_id and source_id = $$primaryKey$$

sqlQuery.name: AlignmentCount
sqlQuery.sql: select count(distinct na_feature_id) as total_alignments from apidb.SAGETAGATTRIBUTES where a.source_id = $$primaryKey$$

sqlQuery.name: GeneCount
sqlQuery.sql: select count(distinct sg.gene_source_id) as number_of_genes_hit from apidb.SAGETAGGENE sg, apidb.SAGETAGATTRIBUTES a where a.na_feature_id = sg.tag_feature_id and a.composite_element_id in (select composite_element_id from apidb.SageTagAttributes where source_id = $$primaryKey$$)
